overview: Cliff began his career on Wall Street, and then founded and ran Infogate (which was sold in 2003 to AOL Time Warner). Cliff (together with partners Vidar and Tom) founded CVT Ventures – to help start and accelerate innovative software companies. Through CVT, Cliff is the Chairman of mSnap (www.msnap.com) – a leading mobile interactivity partner for traditional media companies. Cliff serves as an Advisor (and was the former founding Chairman) of Videoegg (www.videoegg.com) – the leading video ad network for online communities.
